name: HungerGames
description: A comprehensive Hunger Games style battle royale game where players fight to be the last survivor. Features automatic events, sponsor revivals, dynamic rewards based on participation, and detailed player statistics.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user game statistics including wins, deaths, and kills. Data is stored per guild and can be reset by server administrators.
install_msg: Thank you for installing HungerGames! Use `.he` to start a battle royale. Configure settings with `.hungergames set`. Type `.help hungergames` for all commands.
author: UltPanda
